class.name: JavaObject
class.brief_description: Represents an object from the Java Native Interface. It can be return from Java methods called on [JavaClass]. See [JavaClassWrapper] for an example. [b]Note:[/b] This class only works on Android. For any other build, this class does nothing. [b]Note:[/b] This class is not to be confused with [JavaScriptObject].

method.name: get_java_class
method.description: Returns the [JavaClass] that this object is an instance of.
